Title: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
Actors: Ben Kingsley, Scoot McNairy, Lester Speight, Sam Rockwell
Plot: After the events of Iron Man 3, Trevor Slattery is an infamous icon. He's also locked up in a high-security prison. Luckily, his newfound profile has brought him celebrity and protection on the inside - and the actor has gladly agreed to an in-depth profile with a documentary filmmaker.
